Students

Registration for the Spring 2023 semester is open! Apply now with the form below.

What We Provide

1. Homework Help
It is our way to help us identify what your student is learning, but it also helps us catch up your student to their class.



2. Concept Reinforcement
We hope to achieve mastery before moving onto another subject, so they don't have gaps in their learning.



3. Learning Ahead
If they've understood all topics, we teach ahead of what they're learning, so they're ready and can anticipate for what's coming.

Topics

Mathematics

English
Grades 3-5

In this early stage of math, we strive to build a soild foundation for your child. Our curriculum, which consists of addition, division, fractions, decimals, and more will result in a strong arithmetic foundation for future math.

Grades 3-5

In elementary English, we focus on grammar, such as sentence structures and tenses. We also teach vocabulary and reading comprehension to prepare your child for more complex texts.

Grades 6-8

As their exploration of math continues, we solidify their understanding of interpreting graphs and data, include elements of geometry, and move on to the fundamentals of algebra.

Grades 6-8
Algebra 1
